description:
As they watch the Great Sennin World War unfold, Kokutenko asks Shinkohyo which side he thinks will win. Shinkohyo predicts that the victor will be Bunchu, telling the story of why Bunchu continues to protect Yin as its father figure even as the nation is on the verge of ruin. Meanwhile, Fugen stands facing Bunchu alone after his attempt to talk things out with him is cut off... but Bunchu is so powerful that he can`t even manage to scratch him. Then Bunchu unleashes a merciless attack with Kinben...
Source: crunchyroll
